aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.content: I am an open-minded and ambitious PHP developer with over two years of experience in developing and managing web applications. I am constantly striving for professional growth, eagerly exploring new technologies, and taking on challenging projects. My goal is to continuously expand my programming skills and develop into a versatile software development specialist.
